message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
That's a bit more than I was hoping to spend. I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our current offers. How about $120?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $120 is still a little high for me.  Let's split the difference and go with $100. I'm ready to close the deal at that price.
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
